```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


## Data

```{r}
data("WorldPhones")
WorldPhones = data.frame(WorldPhones)
```

```{r}
WorldPhones$year <- as.numeric(rownames(WorldPhones))
WorldPhones
```

```{r}
WorldPhonesLong <- gather(WorldPhones, cont, phoneuse, N.Amer:Mid.Amer, factor_key=TRUE)
WorldPhonesLong
```

\newpage

## Line and Point plots

```{r}
ggplot(data = WorldPhonesLong,
       mapping = aes(
         x = year,
         y = phoneuse
       )) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = WorldPhonesLong,
       mapping = aes(
         x = year,
         y = phoneuse,
         color = cont
       )) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = WorldPhonesLong,
       mapping = aes(
         x = year,
         y = phoneuse,
         color = cont
       )) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = WorldPhonesLong,
       mapping = aes(
         x = year,
         y = phoneuse,
         color = cont
       )) +
  geom_line()
```
